messages.content: Paul Flynn led the campaign to restore the link between pensions and earnings broken by the Tories for 17 years. He fought for the new pension credit, winter fuel allowance and a trebling of value of cold weather payments.
He has used parliament to promote Newport jobs and prosperity and to celebrate the city's sporting and entertainment prowess. Works closely with the city's firms, charities and unions.

Paul Flynn is the only MP who has honoured our fallen soldiers in Iraq and Afghanistan by reading their names in Commons. He was the only voice to oppose stirring up the hornets' nest of Helmand in 2006. Then British deaths were seven. Now they are nearing 300. He campaigns for an honourable early peace.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paul Flynn led the campaign to restore the link between pensions and earnings broken by the Tories for 17 years.
Paul Flynn is the only MP who has honoured our fallen soldiers in Iraq and Afghanistan by reading their names in Commons.
He has fought to make animal cruelty history. He will oppose any step backwards in animal welfare.
Paul is a passionate advocate of renewable solutions to the threat of global warming.
Paul is an award winning campaigner for information and lobbying reforms.
Labour created the Health Service. It will always be our top priority.

issues.environment: Paul is a passionate advocate of renewable solutions to the threat of global warming.
issues.health: Labour created the Health Service. It will always be our top priority.
issues.socialWelfare: Paul Flynn led the campaign to restore the link between pensions and earnings broken by the Tories for 17 years.

politicalExperience.achievements: recognises Paul Flynn's service to Britain and Newport over many years.

quotes.text: Paul is among the most talented of MPs, standing for more power for independently minded backbenchers of whom he is the foremost.
